verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KOV_mine. The Kolwezi Copper Mine is a large-scale copper and cobalt mining operation located in the Lualaba Province of the Democratic Republic of the Congo

web_search_companies.notes: Zijin Mining Group Co., Ltd owns 67% of the mine, while Gecamines S.A. holds 28% and the government has a 5% indirect interest.
